title: Seize the Time:  The Story of the Black Panther Party and Huey P. Newton
description: Bobby Seale, Chairman of th eBlack Panther Party, defendant in the Chicago conspiracy case, and one of the New Haven Panther 14, writes from jail about himself, his party, and its leadership- the black men who have changed themselves, have canged America, and in the course of it, have caused an enormouscontroversy about our liberties and institutions.
author: Bobby Seale
